schema.title: Address list
schema.description: ADO that is used to store a list of addresses.

is_inclusive.ui:title: Is Inclusive
is_inclusive.ui:description: Whether or not the address list is inclusive.
is_inclusive.ui:help: If true the address list is a whitelist. If false the address list is a blacklist.

owner.ui:help: The address of the owner of this list. Can be null.
